# Diplomatic Drones and Peaceful Proposals

In Moscow, drones made quite a scene,   
As Ukraine aimed to intervene.   
While Rubio sought peace,   
With Musk's scuffle to cease,   
Talks in Saudi may mend what's unforeseen.
